projects.name: Pikalead
projects.desc: A curated marketplace for providers and contractors to match on real jobs—pay as you go.

projects.name: iProDash CRM
projects.desc: Lightning-fast CRM for field ops. Manage field jobs, technician assignments, and business reports — all in one place. Features technician management, profit tracking, auto-reports, and smart filtering.

projects.name: Switcher App For DJs
projects.desc: Switcher is a tool for Israeli DJs that allows them to play songs with Hebrew file names on Pioneer all-in-one controllers, which do not support Hebrew. The tool converts file names to English and is built with customTkinter GUI and MongoDB.

projects.name: Yelp Nearby Jobs Responder
projects.desc: Automated script that replies to nearby job leads before they expire. Opens Chrome, logs into Yelp, listens for new emails, and sends custom messages to customers automatically.
